scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.build:win: npm run server:build:win && npm run client:build:win
scripts.reinstall-module: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm i && cd client && npm run reinstall-module && cd .. && cd server && npm run reinstall-module
scripts.make:publish:development: git checkout main && git branch publish/development && git checkout publish/development && sed -i '' 's/#PUB#//g' .gitignore && npm run reset-gitignore && git add . && git commit -m 'publish/development' && git push --set-upstream origin publish/development && git checkout main
scripts.make:publish:staging: git checkout main && git branch publish/staging && git checkout publish/staging && sed -i '' 's/#PUB#//g' .gitignore && npm run reset-gitignore && git add . && git commit -m 'publish/staging' && git push --set-upstream origin publish/staging && git checkout main
scripts.make:publish:production: git checkout main && git branch publish/production && git checkout publish/production && sed -i '' 's/#PUB#//g' .gitignore && npm run reset-gitignore && git add . && git commit -m 'publish/production' && git push --set-upstream origin publish/production && git checkout main
scripts.pub:all: npm run pub:dev && npm run pub:staging && npm run pub:prod
